title: High Ping
body: Since the most recent patch update my ping has suddenly spiked up in games, normally I sit on a constant 39-40 ping but now it boosts up to anywhere between 90-200 on a good day. I've checked any other games and they're fine, I can play cs:go, warframe etc... no problems it's just league and now it's just getting irritating because no matter what I do (i even contacted my ISP regarding the issue to check if it was them but nope, its all clear on that end) is there an actual fix for this? or do I just have to suffer....

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry for the late reply.

Is this issue still occurring? If so could you please do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text and reply back with them here (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results here.
OMFG it happens to me as well as my orher friends. the ping went from 240 to 310 for me, and 140 to 380 from my friends. Cant cs+ lag out a lotrito pls fix

try deleting C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\configs\
and look at the connection guide for league, it will help.
